Ukraine PM calls for fresh sanctions on Russia after Navalny's deathUkraine's prime minister urged the European Union and Japan on Tuesday to impose fresh economic sanctions on Russia after the death of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 04:08:05 GMT ZBYFTSCF5JPXHNJ6AINCWUN2TE https://www.reuters.com/world/ukraine-pm-calls-fresh-sanctions-Russia-after-navalnys-death-2024-02-20/Tim Kelly世界
El Salvador confirms ruling party supermajority in congressEl Salvador's electoral authority on Monday confirmed that President Nayib Bukele's New Ideas party won 54 of 60 seats in Congress in elections earlier this month, after reported irregularities prompted a hand count of the vote. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:32:17 GMT A4S27JPCZVPWDHACM2UEDZMX7I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvador-confirms-ruling-party-supermajority-congress-2024-02-20/Reuters世界美洲
Japan finmin says may have to skip G20 meet due to domestic issuesJapanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki said on Tuesday that he might have to skip a gathering of financial leaders from the Group of 20 major economies in Brazil later this month to ensure passage of budget bills in parliament. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:24:18 GMT P2IFOCPXZ5KURAQ6Q4IUZD2S64 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-finmin-says-may-have-skip-g20-meet-due-domestic-issues-2024-02-20/Tetsushi Kajimoto世界亚太地区
Taiwan says China triggered 'panic' by boarding tourist boatThe boarding of a Taiwanese tourist boat by China's coast guard near sensitive frontline islands triggered "panic" among Taiwan's people, a government minister said on Tuesday, but Taiwan's military added it was not planning to get involved. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:21:50 GMT 4KHIFI5JU5NBNP5X7IMH5GNT44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-minister-says-china-coast-guard-triggers-panic-by-boarding-taiwan-tourist-2024-02-20/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
Haiti judge charges widow, ex-PM over president's assassinationA Haitian judge in charge of the investigation into the 2021 assassination of the Caribbean nation's last president has charged some fifty people, including his widow and a former prime minister, according to a document leaked to local media. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 00:30:14 GMT BDL7E3YK6FMXJIHHUWAJAZBVOU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haiti-judge-charges-widow-ex-pm-over-presidents-assassination-2024-02-20/Reuters世界美洲
China ready to work with EU to uphold free trade, multilateralism, foreign minister saysChina is ready to work with the European Union to uphold free trade, practice multilateralism, and promote an equal and orderly multi-polar world and inclusive economic globalisation, its foreign minister said during a visit to Spain. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 00:12:52 GMT DOG54DL2EFJSHJLIFVWMSOXCDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china-ready-work-with-eu-uphold-free-trade-multilingualism-foreign-minister-says-2024-02-20/Reuters世界
Explainer: Who is Julian Assange?WikiLeaks' founder Julian Assange will launch on Tuesday what could be his last chance in an English court to stop his extradition to the United States to face criminal charges including one under the espionage act. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 00:09:02 GMT 25QXIX4JLNIHFKWSJFHDUPO3TI https://www.reuters.com/world/who-is-julian-assange-2024-02-20/Reuters世界
UK's Prince William to recognise Middle East suffering, office saysBritain's Prince William will carry out a number of engagements to "recognise the human suffering" caused by the conflict in Gaza and the Middle East and to draw attention to the global rise in antisemitism, his office said on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 00:04:56 GMT CPHXMDINWNOH5CXCUM64N2ID3M https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uks-prince-william-recognise-middle-east-suffering-office-says-2024-02-20/Reuters世界英国
WikiLeaks' Assange in last-ditch battle to stop U.S. extraditionWikiLeaks founder Julian Assange begins what could be his last chance to stop his extradition from Britain to the United States on Tuesday after more than 13 years battling the authorities in the English courts. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 00:03:11 GMT OA6I245RLJLEFMXUKUKSSCK4GU https://www.reuters.com/world/wikileaks-assange-last-ditch-battle-stop-us-extradition-2024-02-20/Sam Tobin, Michael Holden世界
El Salvador confirms Bukele's supermajority after opposition calls to void election resultsEl Salvador's election authority on Monday announced that President Nayib Bukele's ruling New Ideas party would control a super majority in the next legislature with 54 out of 60 seats, following a hand count of votes. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 23:58:05 GMT ESMYFSLEJVVBD4GD5J2LTLDJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvador-opposition-requests-repeat-election-congress-after-irregularities-2024-02-19/Reuters世界美洲
Australia boosts defence spending, aims to double warshipsAustralia said on Tuesday it would boost its defence spending by an additional A$11.1 billion ($7.25 billion) over the next decade to procure six 'optionally crewed' warships and 11 new frigates, as it aims to double its fleet of combat-ready ships. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 23:53:25 GMT NLKEOT6ETBITDLBD2WI7AASH5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-invest-additional-a111-bln-over-next-decade-defence-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
